response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $14,000 for the product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic worth but also the potential return on investment for you. I look forward to hearing your decision soon. Should you have any questions or need further information, please don't hesitate to reach out.", "product_price": 14000}
